mapper.sql: id, goodsid, tbId, couponId, couponTotal, couponSurplus, couponName, couponsStartTime, couponsEndTime, couponsUrl, couponsExtensionUrl, createTime, updateTime, fullAmount, preferentialAmount
mapper.select:
select
from t_coupon where goodsid = #{goodsid,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by preferentialAmount desc limit 1
